record.title: ORDER OF PROCEDURE

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that at the conclusion of Senator Lieberman's remarks I be recognized for 15 minutes.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.

speaking-unknown-id.title: Mr.
speaking-unknown-id.name: MAN, LIEBER
speaking-unknown-id.paragraph: Mr. President, I thank the Chair and my friend from Oklahoma.
